SEARCH
Package com.kivojenko.spring.forge.jpa.repository

Interface HasNameRepository<E extends HasName>

Type Parameters:
E - the entity type
public interface HasNameRepository<E extends HasName>
Fragment interface for repositories of entities implementing HasName. Provides standard name-based query methods.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    existsByName(String name)
    Checks if an entity with the exact name exists.
    boolean
    existsByNameIgnoreCase(String name)
    Checks if an entity with the name exists, ignoring case.
    Iterable<E>
    findAllByNameContaining(String name)
    Finds all entities whose name contains the given string.
    Iterable<E>
    findAllByNameContainingIgnoreCase(String name, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
    Finds a page of entities whose name contains the given string, ignoring case.
    Optional<E>
    findByName(String name)
    Finds an entity by its exact name.
    Optional<E>
    findByNameIgnoreCase(String name)
    Finds an entity by its name, ignoring case.

  • Method Details

    • existsByName

      boolean existsByName(String name)
      Checks if an entity with the exact name exists.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to check
      Returns:
      true if exists, false otherwise

    • existsByNameIgnoreCase

      boolean existsByNameIgnoreCase(String name)
      Checks if an entity with the name exists, ignoring case.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to check
      Returns:
      true if exists, false otherwise

    • findByName

      Optional<E> findByName(String name)
      Finds an entity by its exact name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to search for
      Returns:
      an optional containing the entity if found

    • findByNameIgnoreCase

      Optional<E> findByNameIgnoreCase(String name)
      Finds an entity by its name, ignoring case.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to search for
      Returns:
      an optional containing the entity if found

    • findAllByNameContaining

      Iterable<E> findAllByNameContaining(String name)
      Finds all entities whose name contains the given string.
      Parameters:
      name - the substring to search for
      Returns:
      an iterable of matching entities

    • findAllByNameContainingIgnoreCase

      Iterable<E> findAllByNameContainingIgnoreCase(String name, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Finds a page of entities whose name contains the given string, ignoring case.
      Parameters:
      name - the substring to search for
      pageable - the pagination information
      Returns:
      an iterable of matching entities
